pr_title: SQL: Allow skip of bwc tests on `check` task

timeline.message:
SQL: Allow skip of bwc tests on `check` task

Bwc tests can consume much time to build and to run so it's nice to be
able to skip them when running the `check` task on the SQL module.

Introduce a project property `skipBwc` so one can use:
```
./gradlew -p x-pack/plugin/sql check -PskipBwc
```
to skip them.
register new task instead of project property

timeline.bodyText: This wasn't exactly what I was thinking. What I was saying is that checkNoBwc should depend on test, integTest, yamlRestTest, etc. That way it runs those w/o running all the BWC stuff.
timeline.author: mark-vieira
